rl.sqltrainer.domain

Class Exercise

  • java.lang.Object
    • rl.sqltrainer.domain.Exercise

  • public class Exercise
extends java.lang.Object
    An exercise basically consists of an ID, a type, a theme, and a question text. Additionally, a user answer text as well as a solution can be stored within an exercise.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Exercise.Type
      Currently, only two types are supported.
